Text: New Email Address Cc Here is my new email address and business phone You can still reach me at if you would rather send something to the house Have a wonderful Christmas Bonnie

RE Hitoo bad so far of course first day is kind of boring and not a lot of people in the office We get out at noon tomorrow and are off Monday and Tuesday I am not sure when we will be back you can mail the pics if you want to or wait I have some also but the Christmas ones are on a new roll that is not finished yet I am guessing we will either be in Houston or Dallas at New Years Should I use for your address or is mlokay okay it rhymes Also what is Scott Goodells email it came back to me Hope to see you soon and have a great Christmas Oh yeah would you be interested in the pedicure I have left on my Urban Retreat gift certificate I never got around to using it Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December PM To Hitschel Bonnie V Subject Hi How are you Was it hard going in for a full day today I was hoping you were going to call us before you left towngot all the pictures developed from the weekend Made copies for you and there were very cute ones of Meghan and Caroline Do you want me to mail them to you or will you guys be back soon

RE Hipartying Lokays what a wild family Does Chuck E Cheese have a New Years party planned Of course we will spend New Years with you if we are in town We have the air mattress at the house there so we will be okay as far as a place to stay I asked Caroline the other day if she would like to go to the FunPlex with Emily this Saturday and she said Meghan Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December PM To Hitschel Bonnie V Subject RE Hi Dont forget you can always call me What are you guys doing on New Years If youre in Houston and want to spend it with the partying Lokays were available Maybe you can even stay with us Use for the emails Scotts email is They are in the process of changing all our email addresses to the longer ones Thanks for the offer for Urban Retreatcount me in Hitschel Bonnie V on PM To cc Subject RE Hi Not too bad so far of course first day is kind of boring and not a lot of people in the office We get out at noon tomorrow and are off Monday and Tuesday I am not sure when we will be back you can mail the pics if you want to or wait I have some also but the Christmas ones are on a new roll that is not finished yet I am guessing we will either be in Houston or Dallas at New Years Should I use for your address or is mlokay okay it rhymes Also what is Scott Goodells email it came back to me Hope to see you soon and have a great Christmas Oh yeah would you be interested in the pedicure I have left on my Urban Retreat gift certificate I never got around to using it Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December PM To Hitschel Bonnie V Subject Hi How are you Was it hard going in for a full day today I was hoping you were going to call us before you left towngot all the pictures developed from the weekend Made copies for you and there were very cute ones of Meghan and Caroline Do you want me to mail them to you or will you guys be back soon

This weekendHow was Christmas Caroline and Roy installed the Elmo phone yesterday she was mesmerized How does Meghan like hers We will be in town Friday and Saturday do you guys have any plans We are coming back here Sunday morning so I can rest up before having to work a whole days in a row You and I will have to go to the Galleria if you can handle that since I have a gift certificate for Crate and Barrel There is not one here yet Also remind me when Im there to bring you the Urban Retreat stuff Bonnie

Ticketsdont have to respond and put your job on the line I bought six tickets to Clay Walker Saturday Feb at They were each with a handling fee total Top rows all that was left but the coliseum is not nearly as big as the dome The coliseum is downtown and I had to buy for Caroline and Meghan since they are Looking forward to it Talk later Bonnie Hitschel

ABCNEWScom Playboy Seeks Full Disclosure From Women of EnronYou have received this ABCNEWScom mail from bonbon I thought you might find this story interesting Playboy Seeks Full Disclosure From Women of Enron wireEntertainmentreutershtml

RE No truer words were ever spokenThanks for the story Have an all day meeting today and my grandparents are going back to Maryland I did get a pair of pjs for Meaghan at Gymboree the red ones with the little pique heart design Hope you did not get them too Bonnie Hitschel Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday July AM To Subject FW No truer words were ever spoken A man asked his wife what shed like for her birthday Id love to be six again she replied On the morning of her birthday he got her up bright and early and off they went to a local theme park What a day He put her on every ride in the park the Death Slide the Screaming Loop the Wall of Fear everything there was Wow Five hours later she staggered out of the theme park her head reeling and her stomach upside down Right to a McDonalds they went where he husband ordered a Big Mac for her along with extra fries and refreshing chocolate shake Then it was off to a movie the latest Star Wars What a fabulous adventure Finally she wobbled home with her husband and collapsed into bed He leaned over and lovingly asked Well dear what was it like being six again One eye opened You idiot I meant my dress size The moral of this story is If a woman speaks and a man is there to hear her he will get it wrong anyway
FW Have you ever been this tired THIS IS REALLY CUTEAs moms I think you have Bonnie Hitschel HAVE YOU EVER BEEN THIS TIREDjpg

Voluntary SpywareCopy do not forward this entire email and paste it onto a new email that you will send Change all of the answers so that they apply to you Then send this to a whole bunch of people you know INCLUDING the person who sent it to you The theory is that you will learn a lot of little known facts about your friends Remember to send yours back to the person who sent it to you Here goes What time is it pmCentral Nickname Bonnie Parents names Jim Lois Number of candles that appeared on your last birthday cake something Date that you regularly blow them out Pets Buster and Heather dogs Willie fish Eye color blue Hair color brown Piercing ears Tattoos none How much do you love your job love is a strong word Hometown Silver Spring MD Current Residence San Antonio TX Been in love yes Been to Africa no Been toilet papering yes Loved somebody so much it made you cry Yes Been in a car accident no Croutons or bacon bits croutons Sprite or UP no preference Favorite Movie Sleepless in Seattle Favorite Holiday Christmas Favorite day of the week Saturday Favorite word or phrase serenity Favorite Toothpaste Crest Favorite Restaurants Americas in Houston Favorite Flower stargazer lilies Favorite Drinks Mountain Dew margaritas Favorite Sport to watch football Preferred type of ice cream Ben and Jerrys Cherry Garcia Favorite Sesame Street Character Elmo Disney or Warner Bros Disney Favorite Fast Food Restaurant Taco Bell When was your last hospital visit Dec What color is your bedroom carpet Tan How many times did you fail your permit or drivers test None Who is the last person you got mail from before this corporate communications Have you ever been convicted of a crime NO Which single store would you choose to max out your credit card Talbots What do you do most often when you are bored take a nap Name the person that you are friends with that lives the farthestAllen and Dawn San Francisco Most annoying thing clutter Bedtime pm Who will respond the quickest who knows Who is the person you sent this to that is least likely to respond guess Favorite all time TV show Dallas the early ones Last person you went out to dinner with Jim and Michelle Last Movie you saw Bridget Jones Diary Time when you finished pm Bonnie Hitschel

FW Even For YouHope you are all doing well Original Message From Schulle Barbara mailto tiliCorpcom Sent Tuesday May PM To Amiee Hemenway Email Barbara Pickard Email Bonnie V Hitschel Email Carol Taylor Email Juanita Agietos Email Kim P Tran Email Lisa Garcia Email Nawanda Fuller Email Shirley Isbell Email Subject FW Even For You Because in some ways you have these traits and must do these things as well Mothers Day If you send this to just one person it should make it all the way around by Mothers Day This is for all the mothers who have sat up all night with sick toddlers in their arms wiping up barf laced with Oscar Mayer wieners and cherry KoolAid saying Its OK honey Mommys here Who walk around the house all night with their babies when they keep crying and wont stop This is for all the mothers who show up at work with spitup in their hair and milk stains on their blouses and diapers in their purse For all the mothers who run carpools and make cookies and sew Halloween costumes And all the mothers who DONT This is for the mothers who gave birth to babies theyll never see And the mothers who took those babies and gave them homes This is for all the mothers who froze their buns off on metal bleachers at football or soccer games Friday night instead of watching from cars so that when their kids asked Did you see me they could say Of course I wouldnt have missed it for the world and mean it This is for all the mothers who yell at their kids in the grocery store and swat them in despair when they stomp their feet like a tired year old who wants ice cream before dinner This is for all the mothers who sat down with their children and explained all about making babies And for all the mothers who wanted to but just couldnt For all the mothers who read Goodnight Moon twice a night for a year And then read it again Just one more time This is for all the mothers who taught their children to tie their shoelaces before they started school And for all the mothers who opted for Velcro instead This is for all the mothers who teach their sons to cook and their daughters to sink a jump shot This is for all mothers whose heads turn automatically when a little voice calls Mom in a crowd even though they know their own off spring are at home This is for all the mothers who sent their kids to school with stomach aches assuring them theyd be just FINE once they got there only to get calls from the school nurse an hour later asking them to please pick them up Right away This is for mothers whose children have gone astray who cant find the words to reach them For all the mothers who bite their lips sometimes until they bleed when their year olds dye their hair green What makes a good Mother anyway Is it patience Compassion Broad hips The ability to nurse a baby cook dinner and sew a button on a shirt all at the same time Or is it heart Is it the ache you feel when you watch your son or daughter disappear down the street walking to school alone for the very first time The jolt that takes you from sleep to dread from bed to crib at AM to put your hand on the back of a sleeping baby The need to flee from wherever you are and hug your child when you hear news of a fire a car accident a child dying For all the mothers of the victims of all these school shootings and the mothers of those who did the shooting For the mothers of the survivors and the mothers who sat in front of their TVs in horror hugging their child who just came home from school safely This is for mothers who put pinwheels and teddy bears on their childrens graves This is for young mothers stumbling through diaper changes and sleep deprivation And mature mothers learning to let go For working mothers and stayathome mothers Single mothers and married mothers Mothers with money mothers without This is for you all So hang in there Please pass along to all the Moms in your life Home is what catches you when you fall and we all fall Please pass this to all the wonderful mothers you know I just did Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices

REFIESTAHere is the website Fiesta Flambeau parade is Saturday night Battle of the Flowers parade is Friday at Aggie Band is in Fridays parade Texas band in Saturdays The zoo is also having a deal on Saturday and I will look for discount tickets for Fiesta Texasciindexhtml Bring bathing suits too our pool opens Saturday Bonnie Hitschel

RE No truer words were ever spokenThanks for the story Have an all day meeting today and my grandparents are going back to Maryland I did get a pair of pjs for Meaghan at Gymboree the red ones with the little pique heart design Hope you did not get them too Bonnie Hitschel Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday July AM To Subject FW No truer words were ever spoken A man asked his wife what shed like for her birthday Id love to be six again she replied On the morning of her birthday he got her up bright and early and off they went to a local theme park What a day He put her on every ride in the park the Death Slide the Screaming Loop the Wall of Fear everything there was Wow Five hours later she staggered out of the theme park her head reeling and her stomach upside down Right to a McDonalds they went where he husband ordered a Big Mac for her along with extra fries and refreshing chocolate shake Then it was off to a movie the latest Star Wars What a fabulous adventure Finally she wobbled home with her husband and collapsed into bed He leaned over and lovingly asked Well dear what was it like being six again One eye opened You idiot I meant my dress size The moral of this story is If a woman speaks and a man is there to hear her he will get it wrong anyway

FW ComputersHappy Holidays Bonnie Hitschel Subject Computers Dear Tech Support Last year I upgraded from Boyfriend to Husband and noticed a slowdown in the performance of flower and jewelry applications that had operated flawlessly under Boyfriend In addition Husband uninstalled many other valuable programs such as Romance and installed undesirable programs such as NFL and NBA Conversation no longer runs and Housecleaning simply crashes the system Ive tried running Nagging to fix these problems but to no avail What can I do Desperate Dear Desperate First keep in mind that Boyfriend is an entertainment package while Husband is an operating system Install Tears and enter the command C I THOUGHT YOU LOVED ME Husband should then automatically run the applications Guilty and Flowers But remember overuse can cause Husband to default to Grumpy Silence Happy Hour or Beer Beer is a very bad program that will create Snoring LoudlyWAV files DO NOT install Motherin law or reinstall another Boyfriend program These are not supported applications and will crash Husband In summary Husband is a great program but it does have a limited memory and cannot learn new applications quickly You might consider buying additional software to improve performance I personally recommend Hot Food and Lingerie Good luck

FW On the first daySubject On the first day On the first day God created the cow God said You must go to the field with the farmer all day long and suffer under the sun have calves and give milk to support the farmer I will give you a life span of sixty years The cow said Thats a kind of a tough life you want me to live for sixty years Let me have twenty years and Ill give back the other forty And God agreed On the second day God created the dog God said Sit all day by the door of your house and bark at anyone who comes in or walks past I will give you a life span of twenty years The dog said Thats too long to be barking Give me ten years and Ill give back the other ten So God agreed sigh On the third day God created the monkey God said Entertain people do monkey tricks make them laugh Ill give you a twenty year life span Monkey said How boring monkey tricks for twenty years I dont think so Dog gave you back ten so thats what Ill do too okay And God agreed again On the fourth day God created man God said Eat sleep play have sex enjoy Do nothing just enjoy enjoy Ill give you twenty years Man said What Only twenty years No way man Tell you what Ill take my twenty and the forty cow gave back and the ten dog gave back and the ten monkey gave back That makes eighty okay Okay said God Youve got a deal So that is why for the first twenty years we eat sleep play have sex enjoy and do nothing for the next forty years we slave in the sun to support our family for the next ten years we do monkey tricks to entertain our grandchildren and for the last ten years we sit in front of the house and bark at everybody

FW FW Weird Clock move the mouseBonnie Hitschel Original Message From Burke Larry E Sent Wednesday March PM Subject FW FW Weird Clock move the mouse Original Message From Grace KR Kathy mailto Sent Wednesday March AM To Burke Larry E Ricks RA Ruth Barker TL Tamara MacRae CA Carol Subject FW FW Weird Clock move the mouse Kathy Grace Refining Business Support Equiva Services LLC Louisiana St Houston TX Fax Weird Clock move the mouse kind of cool MSN Photos is the easiest way to share and print your photos supportworldwideaspx
